title: Drive Like No One Else So Later You Can Drive Like No One Else (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

Why saving for college is part of the Ramsey baby steps,

Avoiding student loans,

Repairing a car vs. replacing it.
